attributes.title: Cause of near-death experience
attributes.review:
I definitely do not recommend this to people who want to live a long and healthy life.
My grandmother was over visiting when she saw this orange face from this app on my device. She got a heart attack and we had her rushed to the hospital. After a few mental and medical tasks, the doctors declared that she had Cacophobia. The photo traumatized her and she still lays in the hospital bed unmoving, relying on the life support machine that stands nearby.
